nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements

Interface ElementServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ElementService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElementServiceImpl

    public interface ElementServiceLocal
extends ElementService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
